title: New: The Neighbourhood – A Little Death
content:
Cali quintet The Neighbourhood have had quite a year; from numerous big-time premieres to their own UK tour, the group are sure to have a very successful 2013.

Continuing in their usual effortlessly slick R&B style, their new track A Little Death taken from their upcoming Thank You 7″ is bolstered by an added hip-gyrating groove. Telling the story of the regret fueled post-melancholy experienced after a passionless night, there are few bands around at the moment that write with such an unshakeable grasp of pop music.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
